data.name: LblInfo1.Text
data.value:
To learn which entities you have configured and to send quick actions, HASS.Agent uses Home Assistant's API.
Please provide a long-lived access token and the address of your Home Assistant instance. You can get a token in Home Assistant by clicking your profile picture at the bottom-left switch to the security tab at the top and navigating to the bottom of the page until you see the 'CREATE TOKEN' button.
Please note, that for actionable notification functionality you need to provide admin account token.
